Rulings.Edison:
● This card's ① effect can only be used once per turn.
(It "remembers" if it used this effect even after being Set).
Rulings.Tengu:
● This card's ① effect can only be used once per turn.
(It "remembers" if it used this effect even after being Set).
Rulings.Goat:
●Even if 8-Claws Scorpion is equipped with an Equip Spell Card, its ATK is 2400 when it attacks a face-down Defense Position monster.
●The effect of 8-Claws Scorpion is a Trigger Effect that is applied if the condition is correct on activation (8-Claws Scorpion declared an attack against a face-down Defense Position monster.) The target monster does not have to be in face-down Defense Position when the effect of 8-Claws Scorpion is resolved. So if Final Attack Orders is applying, or Ceasefire flips the monster face-up, 8-Claws Scorpion still gets its 2400 ATK.
●The ATK of 8-Claws Scorpion becomes 2400 during damage calculation. You cannot chain Rush Recklessly or Blast with Chain to this effect. If these cards were activated before damage calculation, then the ATK of 8-Claws Scorpion becomes 2400 during damage calculation so those cards have no effect on its ATK.
Rulings.HAT: No rulings found for this card. Request new rulings at https://discord.gg/shVJnYJNpg

Rulings.Cat:
● Even if '8-Claws Scorpion' is equipped with an Equip Spell Card, its ATK is 2400 when it attacks a face-down Defense Position monster.
● The effect of '8-Claws Scorpion' is a Trigger Effect that is applied if the condition is correct on activation ('8-Claws Scorpion' declared an attack against a face-down Defense Position monster.) The target monster does not have to be in face-down Defense Position when the effect of '8-Claws Scorpion' is resolved. So if 'Final Attack Orders' is applying, or 'Ceasefire' flips the monster face-up, '8-Claws Scorpion' still gets its 2400 ATK.
● The ATK of '8-Claws Scorpion' becomes 2400 during damage calculation. You can't chain 'Rush Recklessly' or 'Blast with Chain' to this effect. If these cards were activated before damage calculation, then the ATK of '8-Claws Scorpion' becomes 2400 during damage calculation so those cards have no effect on its ATK.

Rulings.Base: 1. Even if "8-Claws Scorpion" is equipped with an Equip Spell Card, its ATK is 2400 when it attacks a face-down Defense Position monster.\n2. The effect of "8-Claws Scorpion" is a Trigger Effect that is applied if the condition is correct on activation ("8-Claws Scorpion" declared an attack against a face-down Defense Position monster.) The target monster does not have to be in face-down Defense Position when the effect of "8-Claws Scorpion" is resolved. So if "Final Attack Orders" is active, or "Ceasefire" flips the monster face-up, "8-Claws Scorpion" still gets its 2400 ATK.\n3. The ATK of "8-Claws Scorpion" becomes 2400 during damage calculation. You cannot chain "Rush Recklessly" or "Blast with Chain" to this effect. If these cards were activated before damage calculation, then the ATK of "8-Claws Scorpion" becomes 2400 during damage calculation so those cards have no effect on its ATK.

PSCT.Edison:
① Once per turn: You can Set this card.
② If this card attacks a Set monster, during Damage Calculation: 
This card's ATK becomes 2400 until the end of Damage Calculation.
PSCT.Tengu:
① Once per turn: You can Set this card.
② If this card attacks a Set monster, during Damage Calculation: 
This card's ATK becomes 2400 until the end of Damage Calculation.

PSCT.Base: Once per turn, you can flip this card into face-down Defense Position. When this card attacks an opponent's face-down Defense Position monster, this card's ATK becomes 2400 during damage calculation only.
